quotes.message: Destiny is no matter of chance. It is a matter of choice. It is not a thing to be waited for, it is a thing to be achieved.
quotes.name: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.message: Happiness is a choice. You can choose to be happy. There's going to be stress in life, but it's your choice whether you let it affect you or not.
quotes.name: Valerie Bertinelli

quotes.message: We're always going to argue about abortion. It's a hard choice and it's controversial, and that's why I'm pro-choice, because I want people to make their own choices.
quotes.name: Hillary Clinton

quotes.message: Often people ask how I manage to be happy despite having no arms and no legs. The quick answer is that I have a choice. I can be angry about not having limbs, or I can be thankful that I have a purpose. I chose gratitude.
quotes.name: Nick Vujicic

quotes.message: Every man builds his world in his own image. He has the power to choose, but no power to escape the necessity of choice.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: I'm single because I was born that way.
quotes.name: Mae West

quotes.message: Never open the door to a lesser evil, for other and greater ones invariably slink in after it.
quotes.name: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.message: You can have peace. Or you can have freedom. Don't ever count on having both at once.
quotes.name: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.message: There are no safe choices. Only other choices.
quotes.name: Libba Bray

quotes.message: I have seen the best of you, and the worst of you, and I choose both.
quotes.name: Sarah Kay

quotes.message: Life presents many choices, the choices we make determine our future.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: In every single thing you do, you are choosing a direction. Your life is a product of choices.
quotes.name: Dr. Kathleen Hall

quotes.message: Each person has a choice; the choice to do as one may wish and as one wants remains with the individual. If a person sees no benefit to change, they will not change.
quotes.name: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.message: Life is a choice - as is how you handle the pitfalls along its bumpy road.
quotes.name: Julie Donner Andersen

quotes.message: We are partners by fate. We become friends by choice.
quotes.name: Jacquie McTaggart

quotes.message: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities
quotes.name: Joanne Kathleen Rowling

quotes.message: Choose a job you love and you will never have to work a day in your life
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: When you have to make a choice and don't make it, that is in itself a choice.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: A man is happy so long as he chooses to be happy and nothing can stop him.
quotes.name: Alexander Solzenitsyn

quotes.message: Life is a sum of all your choices.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: Choice means saying no to one thing so you can say yes to another.
quotes.name: Dan Millman

quotes.message: What we call the secret of happiness is no more a secret than our willingness to choose life.
quotes.name: Leo F. Buscaglia

quotes.message: A man is happy so long as he choose to be happy.
quotes.name: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.message: For what is the best choice, for each individual is the highest it is possible for him to achieve.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Every person, all the events of your life are drawn there because you have them there. What you choose to do with them is up to you.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: Choice is nothing in itself; everything depends on what one is able to choose.
quotes.name: Harold O. J. Brown

quotes.message: The difficulty in life is the choice.
quotes.name: George Moore

quotes.message: Choice is free, and it is opposed to force and constraint, and a man is said to choose those things which he likes, which he loves, which his soul inclines to, when he is carried to them, not by the compulsion of an external principle, but by his own propension and inclination.
quotes.name: Thomas Manton

quotes.message: When you make a choice, you change the future.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra
